name: Shutterstock Approval Status with no cutted images
description: Shutterstock Approval Status with no cutted images from right side
additional_info: Why in "Approval Status" Shutterstock's contributors see horizontal pictures has cutted from right side? At the same time if there is a square image in a group of files, horizontal pictures has no cutted from right side. Its looks fine. It is very strange. We asked this question to our html-coder. Half an hour later he said: "Need to fix the file review_batch.css on site Shutterstock. That's all." After a half an year Shutterstock did nothing. Therefore we use Stylish extension.
